Name: Film festival
Description: The Film Festival type is for all film festivals worldwide. This type is for the general festival (e.g. Cannes Film Festival), not for the individual occurrences of a festival.

Properties.Name: Date founded
Properties.Description: The date of the first occurrence of this festival.

Properties.Name: Focus
Properties.Description: The genre or type of films this festival screens. Not all festivals will have a focus.

Properties.Name: Location
Properties.Description: The location (e.g. a city or region) or locations in which the festival is held.
